meta.name: description
meta.content: IUSD is closely monitoring the COVID-19 health crisis and created this resource page to keep our community informed and connected while our schools are closed to the public through May 1. On this page you will find updates, information and resources for students and families, frequently asked questions (FAQ), links to expert health agencies, and an archive of District

IUSD is closely monitoring the COVID-19 health crisis and created this resource page to keep our community informed and connected while our schools are closed to the public through May 1. On this page you will find updates, information and resources for students and families, frequently asked questions (FAQ), links to expert health agencies, and an archive of District communications in English, Arabic, Farsi, Japanese, Korean, Mandarin (simplified and traditional), and Spanish.

article.class: node-737856 node node-page node-promoted view-mode-full clearfix

p.span: IUSD is closely monitoring the COVID-19 health crisis and created this resource page to keep our community informed and connected while our schools are closed to the public through May 1. On this page you will find updates, information and resources for students and families, frequently asked questions (FAQ), links to expert health agencies, and an archive of District communications in English, Arabic, Farsi, Japanese, Korean, Mandarin (simplified and traditional), and Spanish.

li.strong: Update April 20: IUSD launched its Emergency Distance Learning survey, which is open through Friday, April 24. Student and parent feedback will help teachers and staff reflect, adapt and continually improve distance learning. To take the brief survey now, visit
for Supt. Walker’s survey letter to the IUSD community.

During the April 14 IUSD Board of Education Meeting, the Board approved IUSD staff’s recommendation to move to “credit/no credit” grades for the final reporting period of the 2019-20 school year for all students. To read

block block-views events-sidebar-block first last odd

article.class: node-737856 node node-page node-promoted view-mode-sidebar clearfix

span.span: For questions about COVID-19 and related medical guidance; federal, state and county health guidelines; travel advisories; health screenings at U.S. ports of entry; quarantines and other government agency related questions, visit the resources below.

div.a: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

ul.li: Make sure your contact information is up to date in Parent Portal
Follow IUSD on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter
If you unsubscribed from school or District emails, you will not receive important updates during an emergency. To re-subscribe, email HelpDesk@iusd.org
Visit iusd.org/Connect for more information about how you can stay connected

div.p: © 2020 Irvine Unified School District. All Rights Reserved.
